channel.title: Help my server will shutdown and ill have to restart it help
channel.description: hwo do i stop my server from like everyone will be playin then it will kick everyone off adn i have to restart it and nobody stuff saves

item.title: Help my server will shutdown and ill have to restart it help
item.dc:creator: @televator0 televator0
item.description:
@televator0 wrote:

honestly idk this is the first time i have seen anyone post an error like this, but my only suggestion to you is for you to change your max people, search for how to change max people, on the search box on the right hand side of this site.

Read full topic
